short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows web developers to experience their website through the perspective of colourblind individuals. Works for any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The purpose of this extension is to assist developers in creating colourblind friendly web applications by allowing the developers to see their web page through the perspective of colourblind individuals. Works with images, videos, and text.

As of version 0.0.0.1, there is support for Protanopia, Deuteranopia and Tritanopia. This extension works for any website.
